section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a majority of the full authorized membership of the Board that includes at least one officer is a quorum.

In addition to the requirements of paragraph (1) of this subsection, on a matter concerning licensing or disciplining of an individual, a quorum shall include:
At least three registered nurse members if a registered nurse or an applicant for a license as a registered nurse is involved; or
At least two licensed practical nurse members if a licensed practical nurse or an applicant for a license as a licensed practical nurse is involved.

text.section:
In addition to the other meeting requirements of this title, the Board shall meet:
At the request of the Secretary; or
If necessary to transact its business.

In accordance with the State budget, each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation, at a rate determined by the Board, for each day on which the member is engaged in the duties of the member's office; and
Reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.

The Board may:
Employ a staff in accordance with the State budget;
Define the duties of its staff; and
Employ an executive director who shall be a registered nurse with a minimum of a master's degree in nursing or the equivalent, in the judgment of the Board, in professional education and administrative experience.
